Earn like a Developer, Without Needing to Know How to Code
Our AI partners do 95% of the work, and 100% of the coding and writing. You just supervise. Earn commission on every mission clients accept.

Common Questions
What if I mess up?
The AI guides you and the human team helps each other. You're never aloneâ€”if you get stuck, ask in the team chat and someone will help.
How is this different from just using ChatGPT?
Our AI partners do 95% of the work, and 100% of the coding and writing. You just supervise. ChatGPT gives you code. We give you: proposal writing, client management, QA testing, deployment guides, and 5 specialized AI citizens who know the ScopeLock workflow.
Do I need to know how to code?
No. Rafael writes 100% of the code. You copy-paste, deploy, and test. If something breaks, Rafael fixes it.
What if the client doesn't pay?
Upwork escrow protects you. Client must fund before work starts. You only get paid when client pays, but clients can't run off without paying through Upwork.
Ready to Start?
Message Nicolas on Telegram. Include your country and hours/week you can work.

Apply via Telegram â†’

How I Work
Simple 4-step process. No meetings required. Daily updates.

You Describe What You Need (Day 1) â€” Send me a message or fill out the estimate form. I'll confirm I understand and give you a fixed price + timeline.
I Create Samples (Days 2-3) â€” For creative work: I create 5-10 samples in your style. For development: I build a working demo or first feature. You approve or request changes.
I Deliver the Full Project (Days 4-7) â€” I complete the rest based on your approved samples/demo. You get daily updates (no need to check in).
You Test & Pay When Satisfied (Day 8+) â€” Test everything. Request changes if needed (2 revision rounds included). You only pay when you're completely happy.

Looking for tagged milestones and acceptance criteria?

View full Proof Log â†’
How it works
Every project follows the same transparent process:

1. ScopeLock
We co-write AC.md with you. Scope locked, price fixed.

[ ]
â†’
2. Evidence Sprint
Working demo â‰¤90s + quantified delta. You see it before committing to full build.

[â—]
â†’
3. AC Green
Acceptance tests pass in CI. You pay only when tests are green.

[âœ“]
What's The Catch?
"Pay only when tests pass" sounds too good. Here's how it actually works:

What if tests pass but it's still broken?
Tests were wrongâ€”I fix at no charge. But if tests correctly verify original criteria and you want new criteria, that's a scope change.

What if I'm unreasonable and keep saying "not good enough"?
Acceptance criteria are executable tests in code, not subjective judgment. If tests pass, milestone is done. Want to change criteria? That's a Change Request.

What if we discover the scope was wrong?
Change Request: document what changed, Swap ($0) or Add (new price), you approve first. No surprise invoices.

How do you prevent infinite revisions?
AC.md includes exact test command + seed data. When CI is green, you can verify yourself. Done means done.

You'll know if we're good before you pay.

Transparent Pricing
Evidence Sprint
$3,000 - $6,000

2-5 days

âœ“ Decision: build full or pivot

Multi-Milestone
$25,000+

1-3 months

Final price fixed upfront. No hourly rates, no surprises.

About Me
I'm Nicolas, a solo developer who ships fast.

I've built AI companion platforms (121+ deployments), trading bots ($75K AUM), and multi-agent systems (97 agents, 99.7% uptime). My open-source CLI tool has 1,051 GitHub stars (top 0.01% of GitHub).

I use AI to speed up delivery without compromising quality. What used to take agencies 4 weeks, I deliver in 4 days. You get professional work at fair prices.

Links:

â†’ GitHub (Personal) â€” 65K commits in 2024, 37 repos
â†’ GitHub (Organization) â€” 23 repos, Terminal Velocity (1.1k stars)
No agencies. No teams. Just me + AI-assisted workflow.

Frequently Asked Questions
How fast can you deliver?

Can you start immediately?

Not a Good Fit If...
âœ— You need someone full-time (I work on milestones, not retainers)
âœ— You want hourly billing (I only do fixed-price)
âœ— Scope is undefined ("just start building, we'll figure it out")
âœ— You need hardware, blockchain, or WordPress customization
Good fit: Web development, AI chatbots, creative AI services (presentations, voice, content), backend APIs.

Contact
